summary: CUSTOMER REPORTED ON TWO SEPARATE OCCASIONS THAT THE TRANSMISSION LOCKED UP WHILE RIDING.  THE SECOND OCCASION HE WAS GOING FORTY MILES AN HOUR AND WAS THROWN FROM THE BIKE. COSMETIC DAMAGE TO BIKE WAS REPAIRED. HE NOW FEELS IT IS UNSAFE TO RIDE AND CANNOT SELL THE BIKE FOR FEAR OF THE NEXT OWNER BEING HURT OR KILLED.D  THIS IS BEING REPORTED BY HIS REPAIR SHOP.  *TR

components: SUSPENSION,SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE,POWER TRAIN,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL,EQUIPMENT
summary: DT: WHEN THE CONSUMER PURCHASED THE MOTORCYCLE, THE SPEEDOMETER WAS OFF 15 MPH, THIS WAS DISCOVERED WHILE  RIDING.  THE LICENSE PLATE BRACKET  BROKE 3 TIMES, AND IN ONE INCIDENT STRUCK THE PASSENGER.  THE VEHICLE HAD DRIVELINE  PROBLEMS.  THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE  TO A DEALER WHO REPLACED THE LICENSE PLATE BRACKET  AS WELL AS THE HORN. THE  MOTORCYCLE  IS CURRENTLY IN THE  REPAIR SHOP FOR REPAIRS ON THE DRIVE TRAIN AND MOTOR.  *AK  THE CONSUMER HAS EXPERIENCED OTHER PROBLEMS WITH THE MOTORCYCLE WHICH ARE AS FOLLOWS:  GAS TANK, EXHAUST PIPE, TURN SIGNAL AND TAIL LIGHTS, SHOCKS, BUSHINGS, BRAKE PADS AND THROTTLE LINKAGE, AND THE MOTOR WAS LEAKING OIL.

components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: VEHICLE CUT OFF ALL OF THE TIME , AND THE SPEEDOMETER WAS INOPERABLE.  CONSUMER TOOK  VEHICLE TO DEALER  FOR  REPAIRS ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS.  HOWEVER, THE PROBLEM RECURRED.  *AK  *TT
